actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans.
Committee on Veterans requested executive comment from the Department of Veterans Affairs and Office of Management and Budget.
Committee on Veterans received executive comment from Department of Veterans Affairs.

official_title: A bill to name the Department of Veterans Affairs Medical Center in Leavenworth, Kansas, as the "Dwight D. Eisenhower Department of Veterans Affairs Medical Center".

summary.text: Designates the Department of Veterans Affairs medical center in Leavenworth, Kansas, as the Dwight D. Eisenhower Department of Veterans Affairs Medical Center.

titles.title: A bill to name the Department of Veterans Affairs Medical Center in Leavenworth, Kansas, as the "Dwight D. Eisenhower Department of Veterans Affairs Medical Center".
